neat shoes for formal events and gatherings that would have, logically, been worn by a 1930s man.

Sensibly practical shoes that would have, logically, been worn by a 1930s man or woman while partaking in outdoor activities. Turns out that gender stereotypes, at least in footwear, collapse in the face of wading through the arctic.
